name: Retro Infinite Dungeon
description:
Retro Infinite Dungeon is a game with Gameboy style graphics. You must survive on each floor.
Each floor of the dungeon is randomly generated and it has differents enemies.
The difficulty grows in each floor of the dungeon so prepare yourself to fight.

Controls: WASD

In the following updates I will add:
-Missions or challenges
-New enemies
-New mode with a bigger board -> Added!
-Bosses

Any suggestion is welcome!
